    A

    act(World) - Method in class datatypes.Animal
    Executes the actions of an animal within the given world, including aging, and performing appropriate behavior based on the time of day.
    age - Variable in class datatypes.Animal
     
    Animal - Class in datatypes
    The Animal class represents a generic organism with characteristics such as age, energy, metabolism, energy decay, and a search radius.
    Animal(Species, double, double, int, double) - Constructor for class datatypes.Animal
    Constructs a new Animal with the specified species, metabolism, energy decay, and search radius.

    C

    consume(Organism, World) - Method in class datatypes.Animal
    Consumes another organism, increasing this organism's energy by the nutritional value of the other organism and triggering the consumption effects on the other organism.

    G

    getNutritionalValue() - Method in class datatypes.Animal
    Calculates the nutritional value of the animal based on its current energy level and its age, where the contribution of age is capped at 6.

    maxEnergy - Variable in class datatypes.Animal

    O

    onConsume(World) - Method in class datatypes.Animal
    Handles the event when the animal is consumed by another organism.

    P

    pursue(World, Location) - Method in class datatypes.Animal
    Causes the animal to pursue a specified location within the given world.

    S

    searchRadius - Variable in class datatypes.Animal
     

    W

    wander(World) - Method in class datatypes.Animal
    Causes the animal to wander to a random empty neighboring tile in the given world.
